text: "Funny How Time Slips Away" is a 1961 song written by Willie Nelson and was first recorded by Billy Walker. It was released by Columbia Records and has been covered by numerous artists over the years and was used in the second season opener Better Call Saul. ==References== Category:1961 songs Category:Country songs Category:The Spinners songs Category:Juice Newton songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Wanda Jackson songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Brenda Lee songs Category:Al Green songs Category:Bryan Ferry songs Category:Lyle Lovett songs Category:Glen Campbell songs Category:Dave Matthews Band songs Category:Dr. John songs
title: Funny How Time Slips Away
